info.title: WiiSX
info.author: Wii64 Team
info.details:
Wii64 Team is:
General Coder - emu_kidid
Graphics & Menu Coder - sepp256  
Audio & Core Coder - tehpola  

The Wii64Team proudly presents WiiSX Beta 2.1
WiiSX is a port of PCSX to the Wii

Special Thanks to:
drmr - Graphics
shagkur/WinterMute - libogc/devkitPPC
Team Twiizers for Wii homebrew

WiiSX and the WiiSX logo are trademarks of the Wii64 Team and should not be used in unofficial builds.
